content.rendered:
University of La Verne Federal Assurance #: FWA00006565.  Check with the IRB if you also need the expiration date.

University of La Verne IRB IORG #:  IORG0003150

The University of La Verne has “unchecked the box” on its federal assurance, which means that federal oversight is limited to projects funded and regulated by federal agencies. Therefore, the University of La Verne also has more flexible procedures for non-grant funded research. The IRB supports the efforts of the Flexibility Coalition to simplify IRB processes.
